Swipe up from the bottom of the screen to open the app drawer.
Scroll down to navigate through the application list.
Click the "Files" icon to open the file manager.
Open the Simple Gallery Pro application, displaying the gallery interface with a search bar at the top.
Click the "Search files" text box to activate the search function.
Type "yVWbhPI25OR" into the search files field.
Open the video file by selecting "Gallery".
